mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from orderinfo o JOIN member1 m ON o.memberIdx = m.memberIdx JOIN order_detail od ON o.orderId = od.orderId WHERE od.productNum=#{productNum}

SELECT o.orderId, userId, userName, TOTAL_PRICE, count from orderinfo o JOIN member1 m ON o.memberIdx = m.memberIdx JOIN order_detail od ON o.orderId = od.orderId WHERE od.productNum=#{productNum} ORDER BY order_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM review r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE r.productNum = #{productNum}

SELECT r.productNum, r.listNum, m.userName, r.userId, content, starScore, created FROM review r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE r.productNum = #{productNum} ORDER BY listNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, q.userId, m.userName, content, q.created, state FROM sellqna q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId = m.userId WHERE productNum=#{productNum} ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
